clearRobots() - Static method in class mangan.Simulator
Clear all robots, the mangan array and all variables, which we need for a clean run.
clearRobots(int) - Method in class mangan.Visualisation
Stops the drawing of new robots and clears all robots from the simulator and also the local robots HashMap.

jup, we don't need this anymore.
